tool_description: APIS for fetching user profiles, all files from the repository, and single or static files from GitHub URL
name: github non-official APIS
title: github non-official APIS

api_list.name: Get Static File URL
api_list.description: This endpoint allows fetching static file URLs like images, .exe, .rar and others

api_list.name: Get all file content
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all content of the file. For e.g. if you're fetching some code file like an index.js it will return you all code inside the file

api_list.name: Get all files URL in repositroy
api_list.description:
This endpoint let you fetch all URLs and names of files that exist on the page
please check this  [page](https://github.com/Zain-ul-din/Algo-and-Data-Structures-Road-Map) and see how it's work

api_list.name: Get GitHub user Profile
api_list.description: Get GitHub user profile name, repository + URL to repository, stars, and some other information
